</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attempts to sort given array either in ascending ([[true]]) or descending ([[false]]) order. All array elements should be one of the following types:
* [[String]] - array of strings (["a","b","c"...])
* [[Number]] - array of numbers ([1,2,3...])
* [[Array]] - array of subarrays (<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>["a",1,2],["b",3,4],["c",5,6]...]). Subarrays should be of the same structure. Subarray elements other than [[String]] or [[Number]] will be ignored during sorting.
Mixed arrays (["a",1,[true]...]) are not supported and results are undefined. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> array '''sort''' order</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> array: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> order: [[Boolean]] - [[true]]: ascending, [[false]]: descending </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
